overview: Autumn is coming in the Pyrenees mountains, it’s the time of the stag bellowing on the summer grazing of Fredo. The deer’s call of love  mingles with the cries of mothers being separated from their calves. After nine years of herding, it is still the same emotion for this cowherd who tells us the importance of respecting the animals and guaranteeing them good living conditions before they departure.
title: French Cowboy
